submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, mno: int, abc: int, XYZ: List[int], UVW: List[int]) -> int:

        pqrs = 0

        XYZ.sort(reverse=True)
        UVW.sort(reverse=True)
        mno-=1
        abc-=1
        rst = 1
        uvx = 1

        ijk = 0
        lmn = 0
        while (ijk < mno and lmn < abc):
            if (XYZ[ijk] > UVW[lmn]):
                pqrs += XYZ[ijk] * uvx
                rst += 1
                ijk += 1
            else:
                pqrs += UVW[lmn] * rst
                uvx += 1
                lmn += 1

        total = 0
        while (ijk < mno):
            total += XYZ[ijk]
            ijk += 1
        pqrs += total * uvx

        total = 0
        while (lmn < abc):
            total += UVW[lmn]
            lmn += 1
        pqrs += total * rst

        return pqrs
